content:
/>
Introduction
This topic contains information about conducting a routine check of original claims, including
responsibilities of the IPC or the development activity upon receipt of a claim or legacy appeal
determining the benefit sought and type of claim
checking for the proper signature
processing on-line applications without a signature
, and
checking for
basic eligibility to the benefit sought
character of discharge (COD)
service verification
blank spaces on the application or insufficient information
, and
acceptable dependency information
.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section A - Process Overview for Screening Mail
citation: Part II, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section A
